ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Ching,Joe Benitez,Keu Cha,Brian Ching,Joe Benitez,Keu Cha
ComicInfo.Summary: The Magdalena fails in her mission to kill Jackie and returns to her base; She is met by the Sisters of the Order of Magdalene who perform the Holy Rite of Consignment to prepare her properly for her role; But Jackie has tracked down the Magdalena and leaves her and the sisters crucified as a warning to those who sent her to kill him.
ComicInfo.Tags: The Franchetti Family,Sister Mariella,Vatican City,Italy,Appolonia Franchetti,Cardinal Innocent,Rome,Jackie Estacado,New York State,Darklings,New York City
ComicInfo.Title: Spear of Destiny, Part 4
